p:
Territory of Washington County of Spokane}ss S.C. Hyde the above named petitioner being duly sworn, on his oath says: that the facts set before in the foregoing petiton are true. S.C. Hyde
Subscribed and sworn to before me this 12th day of October A.D. 1885 J.S. Allen Notary Public
Allowed the 12th day of October A.D. 1885 in the application of S.C. Hyde Esq. Prosecuting attorney for the District comprised of the counties of Spokane Lincoln and Douglas. George Turner Associate Justice of the Supreme Court of Washington
